title: Table 158 - Row 6
clause_text: Sr. No. (1): 10. | Occupancy (2): Shopping/Convenienc e Shopping (not included under Mercantile Occupancy) | Parking Space required (3): One parking space for every 150-sq.m of total floor area in the case of shopping user with each shop up to 20 sq. m in area and one parking space for every 50 sq.m of total floor area for shops each over 20 sq. m area.

values: Shopping/Convenienc e Shopping (not included under Mercantile Occupancy)

One parking space for every 150-sq.m of total floor area in the case of shopping user with each shop up to 20 sq. m in area and one parking space for every 50 sq.m of total floor area for shops each over 20 sq. m area.
